name: King Frog's Riddle
description:
Plot

Long-time ago, in the Unknown Lands, a terrible threat affected the King.  A witch called Madalina appeared suddenly and she transformed the wise regnant into a little frog. 

Fortunately during  the transformation, a subject of the Crown heard her mistakenly reveal the way to break the spell. Only the one able to solve 15 meticulously prepared riddles, will bring back the King to his original status. 

Will you be the chosen one? 

Gameplay

15 riddles to solve, but many others will be soon available.

A terrible witch who'll try to obstruct you in all way.

Different kinds of riddles are waiting for you.

Solve the puzzle interacting with the situation that Madalina put in front of you.

Coming Soon

A new dark enemy is coming to help the witch.

Original Musics
  1. Main Theme
  2. Riddle Theme
  3. Solution Theme
  4. Dark Knight Theme

By Alfredo De Vecchis: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeJOONS-pOtIjkW7cUm9UNg/videos
